title: (x) Speed-Montage - FF TradeMaker {David H (self)}
content:
May I ask for your help, fellow Typophiles..   
Anyone recognize this, hmm, rather speedy than nice, type.? ![SpeedMontage](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111122816im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37742.jpg)   
_I still think Ive seen it before.. But, it could also be a free font, maybe..   
Again, I am thankful for any hint.._
author: formlos

comments.content:
Found it, myself, minutes ( hmm, no, hours, better ) later..   
It should be ' [( FF ) TradeMarker](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111122816/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-trademarker/)', by Critzler, so it seems..
It would be nice if someone would keyword the FF faces...

I would, if I could.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111122816im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
_( Ive tried to sign up for the FontFont keywording, hmm, thing, back then, but somehow I was not able to do so.. Additionally, I think that speaking English, better, would be a big bonus, for keywording typefaces.. )_

by the way trademaker is a modified version of serpentine. mr critzer just cut off the miniserifs and reworked the uppercase letters plus made some modifications on some of the lowercase letters - compare e for example.
